name: SpaceBonesOnlineRPG
0:
”Alexa, Start Space Bones”
”Alexa, Open Space Bones”
”Alexa, play Space Bones”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space bones
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ahoy, me hearties! Get ready to embark on an intergalactic adventure that'll blow your mind! It's time to hoist the Jolly Roger and set sail across the cosmos in search of riches beyond your wildest dreams. But watch out, because you'll encounter all sorts of danger along the way, from treacherous cargo ships to rival pirate crews looking to steal your booty today!

But fear not, ye scallywags, for you've got everything you need to become the most feared space pirate in the galaxy! With your trusty ship, Lucy, and the power of nuclear pasta, you'll be able to repair, upgrade, and fuel up as you explore new star systems and uncover hidden treasures.

But the real thrill comes from taking down other pirates and looting their hard-earned loot! With stunning visuals and real-time updates on the leaderboard, you'll be able to see just how high you can climb on the ranks of the most notorious space pirates around.

So come on, what are you waiting for? Shout "Launch" and set sail into the unknown depths of space. But remember, only the boldest and bravest can survive in this cutthroat world. Are you ready to prove yourself as the greatest space pirate of all time? Then join the crew and let's make history!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
